entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 21 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 21 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023
